title: "‘Less talking, more trials’: UK manufacturers show hesitancy for AI adoption, as the technology goes mainstream"
excerpt: "Almost half (48%) of UK manufacturing firms are looking into or testing AI in a limited capacity, yet just 12% are using it live, everyday around the business, according to a new report from data science consultancy Peak Indicators."
